name: @zenotta/intercom
description: A small utility server to exchange arbitrary data between clients

scripts.build:artifacts: npm run build && npx pkg -t linux,macos,win . --out-path dist
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development LOG_LEVEL=silly BODY_LIMIT=500kb REQUEST_WINDOW=15 KEY_LIFETIME=9999 GET_RATE_LIMIT=9999 SET_RATE_LIMIT=9999 DEL_RATE_LIMIT=9999 REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379 SERVER_PORT=3002 ts-node-dev --respawn ./src/index.ts
scripts.dev:aws: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=develop LOG_LEVEL=silly BODY_LIMIT=500kb REQUEST_WINDOW=15 KEY_LIFETIME=9999 GET_RATE_LIMIT=9999 SET_RATE_LIMIT=9999 DEL_RATE_LIMIT=9999 REDIS_URL=redis://0.0.0.0:6379 SERVER_PORT=6379 node dist/index.js >develop.log
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production LOG_LEVEL=warn BODY_LIMIT=50kb REQUEST_WINDOW=15 KEY_LIFETIME=5 GET_RATE_LIMIT=150 SET_RATE_LIMIT=150 DEL_RATE_LIMIT=150 REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379 SERVER_PORT=3002 node dist/index.js
scripts.start:aws: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production LOG_LEVEL=warn BODY_LIMIT=50kb REQUEST_WINDOW=15 KEY_LIFETIME=5 GET_RATE_LIMIT=150 SET_RATE_LIMIT=150 DEL_RATE_LIMIT=150 REDIS_URL=redis://0.0.0.0:6379 SERVER_PORT=6379 node dist/index.js >production.log

author: Anton Troskie
